job_text:
Software Engineer - Infrastructure

Meta is seeking experienced Software Engineers to join our Infrastructure team in Menlo Park, CA. You will work on building scalable systems that power Facebook, Instagram, and WhatsApp.

Responsibilities:
- Design and implement distributed systems
- Optimize performance and reliability
- Collaborate with product teams

Requirements:
- 3+ years of software engineering experience
- Strong knowledge of C++, Python, or Java
- Experience with distributed systems
- BS/MS in Computer Science or related field

Department: Infrastructure Engineering
Location: Menlo Park, CA
Type: Full-time
candidate_resume:
John Doe
johndoe@email.com | LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/johndoe

B.S. Computer Science, 2020
GPA: 3.8/4.0

EXPERIENCE

Software Engineer | Google | 2020 - 2023
- Built distributed systems for Google Cloud
- Improved latency by 40%
- Led team of 3 engineers

Software Engineering Intern | Amazon | Summer 2019
- Worked on AWS Lambda infrastructure
- Developed monitoring tools

SKILLS
Python, Java, C++, Go, Kubernetes, Docker, AWS, GCP, Distributed Systems, System Design
